message.content: {"id": "17703", "title": "Bug 17703 - Edit > Add Task action should use Workbench dialog as Java Editor does", "description": "", "OB": "When selecting a CU in the packages view and executing the 'File > Add Task' action, a different dialog is displayed compared to executing the action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.", "EB": "The 'File > Add Task' action should use the same dialog as the Java editor's ruler context menu when executed from the packages view.", "SR": "Update the 'Edit > Add Task' action in the packages view to use the same dialog as the Java editor's ruler context menu when executed."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
